title: Jnan Ghosh Stadium
text: Jnan Ghosh Stadium , named after the first director of IIT Kharagpur Sir Jnan Chandra Ghosh is an athletics stadium which has a 400m track, enclosures for Hammer throw, along with a gallery. It is actively used during Inter-IIT and Inter-Hall Events. It is the regular venue for the NSO Health and Fitness classes. The stadium is also used for live shows during Spring Fest .
